subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The New Orleans Saints have set a franchise record for season-ticket sales, four months before making their post-Hurricane Katrina return to the Superdome. The Saints, who spent last season in San Antonio after Katrina severely damaged the Superdome, have sold 54,969 season tickets, eclipsing the high of 53,728 in August 2003.
